title: Second Chance
description: We improve life after brain injury
smallprint:
Second Chance Headway Centre is a private limited company by guarantee #05992718 and also a registered charity #1121645. 

Our Casework Service is commissioned by the Integrated Care Board; we provide services in the community for the NHS as part of their discharge pathways. Our therapy centre is a separate service that relies on charitable fundraising.
mobile_smallprint: Use of this site constitutes acceptance of our [Privacy Policy](/privacy/) and [Cookie Statement](/cookies/)
address: Second Chance Headway Centre, Almshouse Lane, Wakefield WF1 1AD
